message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $140. I think it's a great deal for something of this quality.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I can't go as low as $90.  How about we meet in the middle at $115?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we meet at $105? I'm willing to compromise, but I really need to stay under $100.
